body:
so i have been watching alot of snapshot videos lately.
and i watched this video about 1.9.1 and 1.9.2 that swimmingbird made https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=PHZvgHxY1EQ and he said u can no longer disable cooldown wish means u cant eneble spamclicking anymore but i am not sure if u still can use the old combat pvp who knows more about this?






sorry for my bad english
jordi
